group_1.narration: I was supposed to be the one closest to her...@but I never noticed anything.
And now, that truth was staring us in the face.
But, when I finally saw that side of Tsuruno,@I realized something.
I didn't want Tsuruno to keep pretending@to be strong anymore...
...No, I wanted to make sure she didn't have to@pretend to be strong anymore.
It was by finally accepting Tsuruno's weakness@that the second Connect succeeded.
Facing Tsuruno meant that I had to face@my own shortcomings, too.
I was able to move forward because Iroha once taught me@that if you make a mistake, it's okay to fix it.
And Tsuruno, now freed from the Uwasa, was surrounded by@Mifuyu and the others who had helped save her.
Maybe...we really can spend time at Mikazuki Villa again,@with Mifuyu and everyone else.
...I started to think that maybe,@such a happy future could exist.
After that, Iroha and Kaname combined their strength and@destroyed the device the Magius were using to gather Witches.@But it wasn't all good news.
Because of that, Walpurgisnacht, which had been@moving toward Kamihama City, changed its course and@started heading for Mitakihara.
Kaname and her friends left to go protect Mitakihara.
And then, we at Mikazuki Villa finally came together@as one and rose up to defeat the Magius.
Yes... Together with my friends, once again...!
I used to think I didn't need friends...@But meeting Iroha changed me.
I've had enough of all that quiet at Mikazuki Villa.@Maybe...I actually prefer things just a little too noisy.
Oh, but don't tell Felicia, okay?@If it gets any louder around there,@we really will start bothering the neighbors.
What happened in the battle against the Magius?
...I'd love to tell you, but it's about time@I head back to Mikazuki Villa.
So, that's all for this story.
But the story of one Magical Girl...
...No, the stories of all Magical Girls, will go on.
So I'm sure that someday, I'll come back to@continue today's story...and next time,@I'll bring my friends with me.
Until then, see you around.
